name: Gem Reaper: Deliverer of Light
description:
A short game demo where you play as the Gem Reaper.

Your job is to collect gems and feed them to the enchanted volcano to power the daylight of your land.

Explore and collect while leaving your mark on the land.

CONTROLS:

Directions: WASD / Arrow Keys

[E] to pick up

[R] to throw single gem

[Q] to throw all gems

[L] to restart game
